  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770208011</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Melodic Phrases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Melodic Phrasen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expressions Mélodiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frases Melodic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frasi Melodic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελωδικές φράσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Frases Melódicas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Some activities to help students practice identifying phrases in a melody.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Etwas Aktivitäten, zum der Kursteilnehmer zu 
helfen Phrasen, in einer Melodie zu kennzeichnen zu üben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelques activités pour aider des étudiants à 
pratiquer identifier des expressions dans une mélodie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Algumas atividades para ajudar a estudantes 
praticar identificar frases em uma melodia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alcune attività per aiutare gli allievi a 
esercitarsi in identificare le frasi in una melodia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μερικές δραστηριότητες για να βοηθήσει την πρακτική 
σπουδαστών που προσδιορίζει τις φράσεις σε μια μελωδία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Algunas actividades para ayudar a estudiantes a 
practicar el identificar de frases en una melodía.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
